description.value: You rush forward, flapping your wings for a bit of lift, and can use that momentum to knock down a foe. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap], and if you land within melee reach of at least one enemy, you can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip] that enemy. You don't need to have one hand free. If you successfully knock the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone], you can Leap again. If you have a fly Speed, you can Fly instead of Leap.
